name: Mienu Monogatari: Shoukan Gaki 2nd - UNSEEN
description:
If a long vacation is what you're after...

Following the events of Shoukan Gaki 1, former "Chosen One" Lorelei and the bratty summoneress Maura decide to head out on a nice summer vacation. However, a frantic hat chase across a quiet port town sees Maura cast away in an unfamiliar world. Now but a pale image of her former self, Maura must do good deeds for the people of this strange land to find her way back home, and to find her own self once again. Will Maura garner the goodwill of the people and be seen for who she truly is? Or will she forever be doomed to exist in a world unseen?

SALIENT FEATURES
  • Clear, easy-to-read 12-point MS Gothic font
  • Summon 3 (arguably) creatures from in-universe works of fiction based on REAL works of fiction
  • Kickable buckets
New to Shoukan Gaki 2nd
  • Reasonably open-ended gameplay and several sidequests which take Maura from the beach to the mountains and several stops inbetween
  • Cameos from and references to other /vrpgm/ Jam games which are sure to appeal to only a handful of people
  • You get to see Maura without her hat (a series first)

Version Updates  (See included changelog for more details)

V1.03

- A certain early game summon now works as intended

- Minor fix to a symbol encounter which would not vanish after being defeated

V1.02

- Fixed an invisible something which should not have ever been that way.

V1.01

- Placed the starting position where it belongs rather than on the FINAL MAP of the game

- Removed a very large debugging crystal in the center of town
